City Council
============

* [Home](https://www.floresvilletx.gov)
* [Government](https://www.floresvilletx.gov/government/)
* City Council

The City of Floresville is served by the mayor and five council members. The city council formally meets the second and fourth Thursday of the month at 6:00 pm. Unless otherwise noted, meetings take place at City Hall, located at [1120 D Street](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Floresville+City+Hall/@29.1328234,-98.1606085,16z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x865d1fa299f132bf:0x57da1b9af4eef29!8m2!3d29.1328187!4d-98.1562258?hl=en). Public participation is encouraged; attendees must follow [City Council Rules of Procedure](https://www.floresvilletx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2016/07/COUNCIL-MTG-RULES.pdf). Many city council meetings are livestreamed and stored on our [Meeting Videos page](https://www.floresvilletx.gov/government/meeting-videos/) and our [Facebook page](https://www.facebook.com/floresvilletx/videos/).
